LanguageData.TM_Dire_WolfR.label: dire wolf
LanguageData.TM_Dire_WolfR.description: Dire wolves roam the north in great packs and fear neither man nor megasloth. A savage predator armed with razor sharp teeth and a coat like steel thread, dire wolves are as fierce as any known creature. They are often tied to mythical lore and are said to possess a unique link to arcane powers.
LanguageData.TM_Dire_WolfR.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.TM_Dire_WolfR.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.TM_Dire_WolfR.tools.3.label: head
